parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the campaign to update.

parameters.name: dataExtraDimensions
parameters.description: A list of vehicle attributes to associate with a signal. Default: An empty array (string) ---

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Specifies how to update a campaign. The action can be one of the following: APPROVE - To approve delivering a data collection scheme to vehicles. SUSPEND - To suspend collecting signal data. The campaign is deleted from vehicles and all vehicles in the suspended campaign will stop sending data. RESUME - To reactivate the SUSPEND campaign. The campaign is redeployed to all vehicles and the vehicles will resume sending data. UPDATE - To update a campaign.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the campaign.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the updated campaign.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The state of a campaign. The status can be one of:
CREATING - Amazon Web Services IoT FleetWise is processing your request to create the campaign.

WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL - After a campaign is created, it enters the WAITING_FOR_APPROVAL state. To allow Amazon Web Services IoT FleetWise to deploy the campaign to the target vehicle or fleet, use the API operation to approve the campaign.
SUSPENDED - The campaign is suspended. To resume the campaign, use the API operation.
